inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//log type trend
Syslog
| where Computer =~ 'sysloghost' 
| extend LogType= extract('^([a-xA-Z]*),',1,SyslogMessage ) 
| summarize LogTypeCount= count() by LogType , TimeGenerated

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//log volume trend
Syslog
| where Computer =~ 'sysloghost' 
| summarize LogVolume= count() by TimeGenerated

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
// log type count
Syslog
| where Computer =~ 'sysloghost' 
| extend LogType= extract('^([a-xA-Z]*),',1,SyslogMessage ) 
| summarize LogTypeCount= count() by LogType

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//top 5 malware seen
Syslog
| where Computer =~ 'sysloghost' 
| extend LogType= extract('^([a-xA-Z]*),',1,SyslogMessage ) 
| where LogType =~'Threat'
| extend MalwareMD5= extract('MD5: (.*?),',1,SyslogMessage) 
| summarize MalwareCount= count() by MalwareMD5
| top 5 by MalwareCount desc

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//Threat classification
Syslog
| where Computer =~ 'sysloghost' 
| extend LogType= extract('^([a-xA-Z]*),',1,SyslogMessage ) 
| where LogType =~'Threat'
| extend Classification= extract('Threat Classification: (.*?)#',1,SyslogMessage)
| summarize count() by Classification 
| top 5 by count_ desc

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//how new is malware
Syslog
| where Computer =~ 'sysloghost' 
| extend LogType= extract('^([a-xA-Z]*),',1,SyslogMessage ) 
| where LogType =~'Threat'
| extend Unique= extract('Is Unique To Cylance: (.*?),',1,SyslogMessage)
| summarize count() by Unique

content.PartTitle: Is This First Time Cylance Has Seen This Malware?

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//Detected By
Syslog
| where Computer =~ 'sysloghost' 
| extend LogType= extract('^([a-xA-Z]*),',1,SyslogMessage ) 
| where LogType =~'Threat'
| extend DetectionMethod= extract('Detected By: (.*?),',1,SyslogMessage)
| summarize count() by DetectionMethod

content.Query:
//Detected By
Syslog
| where Computer =~ 'sysloghost' 
| extend LogType= extract('^([a-xA-Z]*),',1,SyslogMessage ) 
| where LogType =~'Threat'
| extend DetectionMethod= extract('Detected By: (.*?),',1,SyslogMessage)
| summarize Count=count() by DetectionMethod

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//Count by status
Syslog
| where Computer =~ 'sysloghost' 
| extend LogType= extract('^([a-xA-Z]*),',1,SyslogMessage ) 
| where LogType =~'Threat'
| extend CylanceStatus= extract('Status: (.*?),',1,SyslogMessage)
| summarize count() by CylanceStatus

content.Query:
//Count by status
Syslog
| where Computer =~ 'sysloghost' 
| extend LogType= extract('^([a-xA-Z]*),',1,SyslogMessage ) 
| where LogType =~'Threat'
| extend CylanceStatus= extract('Status: (.*?),',1,SyslogMessage)
| summarize StatusCount=count() by CylanceStatus

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//threat type make pie chart 
Syslog 
| where Computer =~ 'sysloghost' 
| extend LogType= extract('^([a-xA-Z]*),',1,SyslogMessage )  
| where LogType =~'Threat' 
| extend EventName = extract('Event Name: (.*?),',1,SyslogMessage )  
| summarize EventType= count() by EventName

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//top 5 device in threat
Syslog
| where Computer =~ 'sysloghost' 
| extend LogType= extract('^([a-xA-Z]*),',1,SyslogMessage ) 
| where LogType =~'Threat'
| extend DeviceName = extract('Device Name: (.*?),',1,SyslogMessage)
| where DeviceName != ''
| summarize DeviceCount=count() by DeviceName
| top 5 by DeviceCount desc

content.PartTitle: Top 5 Devices With Threats By Count

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//unsafe count by device
Syslog
| where Computer =~ 'sysloghost' 
| extend LogType= extract('^([a-xA-Z]*),',1,SyslogMessage ) 
| where LogType =~'Threat'
| extend CylanceStatus= extract('Status: (.*?),',1,SyslogMessage)
| where CylanceStatus =~'Unsafe'
| extend DeviceName = extract('Device Name: (.*?),',1,SyslogMessage)
| summarize count() by DeviceName 
| top 5 by count_ desc nulls last

content.PartTitle: Top 5 Devices With Unsafe Threats By Count
content.Query:
//unsafe count by device
Syslog
| where Computer =~ 'sysloghost' 
| extend LogType= extract('^([a-xA-Z]*),',1,SyslogMessage ) 
| where LogType =~'Threat'
| extend CylanceStatus= extract('Status: (.*?),',1,SyslogMessage)
| where CylanceStatus =~'Unsafe'
| extend DeviceName = extract('Device Name: (.*?),',1,SyslogMessage)
| summarize StatusCount=count() by DeviceName 
| top 5 by StatusCount nulls last

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//malware type pie chart 
Syslog 
| where Computer =~ 'sysloghost'  
| extend LogType= extract('^([a-xA-Z]*),',1,SyslogMessage )  
| where LogType =~'Threat' 
| extend FileType= extract('File Type: (.*?),',1,SyslogMessage) 
| summarize FileTypeCount=count() by  FileType

content.PartTitle: File Type Associated With Threat By Count

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//Audit logs type
Syslog
| where Computer =~ 'sysloghost' 
| extend LogType= extract('^([a-xA-Z]*),',1,SyslogMessage ) 
| where LogType =~'AuditLog'
| extend EventName = extract('Event Name: (.*?),',1,SyslogMessage ) 
| summarize EventType= count() by EventName

content.Query:
//Audit logs type
Syslog
| where Computer =~ 'sysloghost' 
| extend LogType= extract('^([a-xA-Z]*),',1,SyslogMessage ) 
| where LogType =~'AuditLog'
| extend EventName = extract('Event Name: (.*?),',1,SyslogMessage ) 
| summarize EventCount= count() by EventName

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//Agent Version Across 
Syslog 
| where Computer =~ 'sysloghost'  
| extend AgentVersion= extract('Agent Version: (.*?),',1,SyslogMessage) 
| where AgentVersion !='' 
| extend DeviceName = extract('Device Name: (.*?),',1,SyslogMessage) 
| summarize DeviceCount=dcount(DeviceName) by AgentVersion

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//device logs
Syslog
| where Computer =~ 'sysloghost' 
| extend LogType= extract('^([a-xA-Z]*),',1,SyslogMessage ) 
| where LogType =~'Device'
| extend EventName = extract('Event Name: (.*?),',1,SyslogMessage ) 
| summarize EventType= count() by EventName

content.Query:
//device logs
Syslog
| where Computer =~ 'sysloghost' 
| extend LogType= extract('^([a-xA-Z]*),',1,SyslogMessage ) 
| where LogType =~'Device'
| extend EventName = extract('Event Name: (.*?),',1,SyslogMessage ) 
| summarize EventCount= count() by EventName
